Text: We need the BAME report on COVID-19 now. We need to ensure ALL MPs can vote safely today. We need Boris Johnson to condemn Donald Trump in the strongest possible terms regardless of where this leaves a trade agreement. These 3 things are all absolutely crucial today
Dear fundamentalist Christian Trump supporters: If Obama had held the Bible backwards and upside down, you would immediately have called him the Antichrist.

Powerful words from @realDonaldTrump tonight making it clear all Americans are going to be protected.This is what we elected President Trump to do - to lead with bold, dramatic action. These lawless riots ; acts of violence will not continue indefinitely. They will end now.

The Democrats have a plan! They want people to loot and burn down America so they can make President Trump look like the bad guyThe Governors ; Mayors could easily stop this madness but They hate Trump more than they love the people who they swore to protect and serve.

Trump can't cope with the pandemic, can't avoid mass unemployment, and can't stem chaos in the streets but at least he can walk across the street (after clearing the block of nonviolent protestors with tear gas and flash bangs).Inspiring stuff.

Trump would rather start a civil war than say that black people deserve to be alive. Johnson would rather look after his mate than protect you from a pandemic. Stop voting for people that do not care about you.
This is how scenes from the White House as Trump declared himself dictator were viewed live in Australia. #ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd #REVOLUTION #BlackLivesMatter #CivilWar https://t.co/Ak3aHg3iWa

Former Vice President Joe Biden's campaign and Sen. Bernie Sanders' senior leadership have crafted a ceasefire in the ideological warfare that has dominated the Democratic Party, and its emboldened left wing, for the past five years. https://t.co/D7g5Jf6eq2

Where is Congress? Where is the Supreme Court? Where are the mayors and governors? Living former presidents? Where are the university presidents, foundation heads, religious leaders, corporate leaders, union heads, editors and publishers? All must stand up to Trump's madness.
Biden, in speech to the nation, plans to denounce President Trump's actions against protesters and vow to heal racial wounds - The Washington Post https://t.co/LvobzowjOu
